name: ClientWise Portal
description: A cloud-based platform designed to modernize family law practice management. It provides lawyers and clients with smart intake tools that simplify the collection of case information, reduce paperwork, and improve communication. By digitizing processes such as estate division, custody arrangements, and evidence timelines, the system helps legal teams work more efficiently while giving clients a clearer, more structured way to participate in their cases.

name: Homecare Management App
description: Similar to a job portal but focused solely on home care nursing in the UK. This includes storing personal data of users with Google Map implementation for location verification.

name: Region 12 Online Processing Platform
description: A government online platform that manages sales promotion and other services catering to all users/businesses in region 12.

name: Job Portal System
description: An online platform designed to connect job seekers with employers in a streamlined and efficient way. It provides a centralized space where candidates can create profiles, upload resumes, and search for opportunities that match their skills and interests.

name: HRIS - Human Resource Information System
description: A centralized platform that manages employee data, payroll, and attendance. It automates salary computation based on time logs, overtime, and leave records, while keeping employee profiles organized.

name: POS System for Small Business
description: A digital solution that combines sales, inventory, and customer management into one platform. Instead of relying on manual cash registers or spreadsheets, the system automates transactions, tracks stock levels, and records customer purchases. This helps small businesses save time, reduce errors, and gain better visibility into their daily operations.
